name: 64XFIGHT
description:
64XFIGHT

A two-person fighting game built from 64x64 pixel footage that magnifies

 the graphics by a factor of 10 for ease of playing ,

 ( some of the footage looks a bit rough without specialized pixel processing.) 

This is my first game! So the various content may not be very mature

player1：

use 'A' and 'D' to move player1

use 'W' to jump

use 'G' and 'J' to attack

player2：

use 'LEFT' and 'right' to move player2

use 'UP' to jump

use 'K_NUM1' and 'K_NUM2' to attack

use 'ESC' quit
